venue.address_2: 1 1/2 miles west of Bromley ski area
venue.name: Bromley Mountain

item.description:
Marge Fish will be leading a Green Mountain Club hike to Bromley Mtn via the Long Trail either from Rt 11/30 to the summit and back the same way or, spotting cars at Rt 11/30 snow shoe from Mad Tom Notch to the Bromley summit and down to Rt 11/3 , depending on snow conditions. leaders's choice.

Meet at the trailhead parking lot on rt 11/30, which is 0.5 miles west of the junction of rt 11 and rt 30 and approximately 1 1/2 miles west of Bromley ski area - is is a plowed lot. we will definitely hike up and aback down from and to this parking area


6 miles, moderate

trip leader Marge Fish, 824-3662,
marge.fish@gmail.com
item.name: Bromley Mtn via the Long Trail
